summary.para: Gets the DPI reported by the metafile.

param.name: dpiX
param.para: Receives the horizontal DPI reported by the metafile.

param.name: dpiY
param.para: Receives the vertical DPI reported by the metafile.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the bounds of the metafile in source space in DIPs. This corresponds to the frame rect in an EMF/EMF+.

param.name: bounds
param.para: The bounds, in DIPs, of the metafile.

returns.para: S_OK if successful, otherwise a failure HRESULT.

summary.para: This interface performs all the same functions as the existing ID2D1GdiMetafile interface. It also enables accessing the metafile DPI and bounds.
